Name: Dry Orange Martini
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of grapefruit zest twist.
EXPRESS grapefruit zest twist over cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Bone dry, orangey, aptly named Martini.
History: Created in 2003 by Wayne Collins for Maxxium UK.
Nutrition: One serving of Dry Orange Martini contains 175 calories
